title: Scamp - The Deadcalm  MP3   320k   ak2014
description:
Scamp - The Deadcalm  MP3   320k   ak2014 What we got.... Scamp - The Deadcalm

Another quite attractive Danish Groove Metal band, built with Modern influences ranging from SOILWORK to FIVE FINGER DEATH PUNCH to KILLSWITCH ENGAGE to DEMON HUNTER with obvious stints from European masters such as ENGEL or even TEXTURES in their most Melodic ways, updated by intercourse with electronic loops, powered by a few synthetic gimmicks in the MNEMIC tradition and mostly a comparable mania in the hypnotic sharp riffage.

This slight industrial progressiveness flavors in their sound is a real stints of fresh air, indeed an efficient way to escape monotony (Ã¢â‚¬Å“The LongingÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½), obviously most of the arrangements and structures are cleverer than your regular Metal Core/Neo Metal stuff, enhanced by a much more melodic instinct to (Ã¢â‚¬Å“Deadhead Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½) not unlike compatriots MERCENARY (Ã¢â‚¬Å“AdrianÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½/"silent inferno" / "Edge Of Devastation") or PITCHBLACK with only a few additional shot of testosterone, resulting in an obsessive fury of a pure adrenaline kick.
